tweets.text:
Across the #northwest there are currently;  
➡️9 flood alerts and 
➡️1 flood warning in place. 

Visit https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn for the latest. 

#prepareactsurvive #floodalert #floodwarning #bepreparef

@MrCheapSeats The Black🐟drain will be the life support for the Gaywood river💩💀🐟as this Chalk river has been over dredged & for years polluted 🙏save it @jamesowild @WestNorfolkBC @EnvAgencyAnglia @The_WMA @N_Rivers_Trust @theriverstrust @Feargal_Sharkey @WildTroutTrust https://t.co/iJA9pjL03t
Keep an eye on our flood warnings page. New flood warnings issued in #Cornwall for River Fowey, River Torridge and River Kensey https://t.co/QdPKdEYx15 https://t.co/DVz04cN9lK

Heavy rain in the south-west of England today will bring a high risk of surface water #flooding.

Stay safe and don’t walk or drive through flood water.
For guidance on #SurfaceWaterFlooding in your area, contact your local authority.

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/ptfCwRMWSc
And just when you think things can’t get any worse....when will the flood defence be going up @EnvAgencySW @ExeterCouncil? https://t.co/gaGjnYxXqQ

Ooh this is so good, lovely @slowtheflow_UK piece too and a cheeky bonus I’m in background with team Slow The Flow @adrianandkim we do some amazing stuff here in Calderdale @Calderdale @CalderdaleFound @EnvAgencyYNE @ScottAPatient https://t.co/Kq6n2lwFo1

annotations.normalized_text: NFFDM National Flood Forecasting Duty Manager

tweets.text: @MrSneakySnicker @DCfieldteamsEA @johncurtinEA @jamiemcclaughl1 @EnvAgencySW @MariaHerlihyEA @DeTom48 @MoretonBack1 For Worcester maybe have a word with @DaveThroupEA we have our 1st incident management duty roles, mine is NFFDM National Flood Forecasting Duty Manager, but also 2nd & 3rd  roles if we arent being used for the primary role. They're called FISO's Flood Incident Support Officers
@Nick_Ely @DCfieldteamsEA @johncurtinEA @jamiemcclaughl1 @EnvAgencySW @MariaHerlihyEA @DeTom48 @MoretonBack1 How would one become a field volunteer? Worcester based
Heavy rain across the South West is expected to impact some roads. Take care and never drive through flood water. https://t.co/XoURKx3zxw

Enjoyable visit to R. Chess today. Shocking to see road runoff #pollution but good discussions on planning a brighter future for #chalkstreams & the communities living alongside them. Thanks @TonyJuniper @AffinityWater @Chilternstreams @PJennings88 @CharlesWalkerMP @EnvAgency https://t.co/JKooSEhh8W

tweets.text: Flood warning for the local Lifton area in force. #lifton #flooding #floodwarning #launceston @EnvAgencySW @WestDevon_BC https://t.co/p28aQBMwPo
We have 8 flood warnings out across the South West including a new one for the River Exe #Exeter. Check if you're at risk and what to do to prepare for a flood: https://t.co/QdPKdEYx15

Our field teams are out across the South West tonight clearing grills and trash screen and operating flood defences to help prevent flooding #floodaware 
https://t.co/QdPKdEYx15 https://t.co/CNZ4zPcD01

Just received this from @EnvAgency

"...current levels of abstraction are causing environmental damage. Any increase in use WITHIN EXISTING LICENSED VOLUMES will increase the pressure on a system that is already failing environmental targets." 

Thread 1/2 https://t.co/1mnOuVTXt7

With the Eythrope wetland complete we are now looking forward to watching the site develop over the next few years! Special thanks to Waddesdon Estate, @RiverThameCT, @EnvAgency, @whitehorsecontr and fab volunteers: Adam Price, Sue Faulds and Mark Ritson. https://t.co/iMTNxUMrBj https://t.co/K6iRLQKFlx

Looking for a New Year's Challenge? Join us for #Pledge2021 and help to save 2,021 litres of water in January. Each day we will send you a simple challenge to help you get involved. Head to https://t.co/c4FFljh3cP to sign up and start the year by helping the planet 🌎💧 https://t.co/bMXrFCIte9

tweets.text:
@georgiaes @XRMerton @CarolineRussell @rosamund_ElsFdn @StopTheRebuild For the 12 months at #SLWP Beddington Incinerator🏭 from Dec 2019 to Nov 2020 we saw 13 @EnvAgency permit breaches!

☠️ 2 Dec CO
☠️ 20 Dec CO
☠️ 30 Dec CO
☠️ 28 Feb SO2
☠️ 24 May VOC
☠️ 21 Jun VOC
☠️ 9 Aug VOC
☠️ 16 Aug VOC
☠️ 4 Oct CO
☠️ 18 Oct VOC
☠️ 14 Nov VOC x2
☠️ 24 Nov SO2 https://t.co/YLdPZz2YXh

@hadnock @VisitDeanWye But look at the colour of the water. Red from all the soil being washed away to the sea. Valuable topsoil on which future harvests depend. Plus Phosphate and Nitrate pollution killing wildlife. Farmers must stop this soil runoff happening.
@Nick_Ely @DCfieldteamsEA @johncurtinEA @jamiemcclaughl1 @EnvAgencySW @MariaHerlihyEA @DeTom48 @MoretonBack1 Good work. Loved my time doing that. They are our unsung heroes
@StGeorgesTrust1 We reached a position sometime ago that the @EnvAgency are a part of the problem not the solution. I’ve said it before, they have absolutely no credibility left in this conversation.
. Any thoughts @Feargal_Sharkey ? Like why did the Environment Agency let them get trashed in the first place?? Flush out the Quangos. No place for Deadnecks https://t.co/2FIeO6tGlR

A flood warning has been issued for River Teign (lower) from Chudleigh to Kingsteignton, including New Bridge, Ventiford, Preston, Teigngrace, Teign Bridge and Exeter Road #Devon https://t.co/K0E7OUFIx6 https://t.co/4Jw6SKSZYy

⚠️Check your #flood risk!
⚠️Sign up for free warnings! 
⚠️Keep up to date with the latest situation!

urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
With heavy rain forecast into the weekend there's a risk of #flooding in parts of #Shropshire & #Herefordshire.

Our teams are getting prepared for #flood to keep communities safe. Are you prepared?

⚠️Please stay #FloodAware & check your flood risk here: https://t.co/4HSc5MbL20 https://t.co/9ls5vnQ8Mb

⚠️Flood Alert⚠️| As rain continues, the @EnvAgency expect the River Wye to peak Sat afternoon at the Old Wye Bridge & Greyfriars Avenue, Hereford. The level should not exceed the barriers. 
Please avoid driving through flood water & keep up to date: https://t.co/VvsaRfax6z https://t.co/k0AT6QpP5h
@mrsk3r @slowtheflow_UK @adrianandkim @Calderdale @CalderdaleFound @EnvAgencyYNE Sara and rooted are ace ⭐️⭐️ https://t.co/O2OwPVUvAv

Really great news at the end of a tough year to have Lucy and @MoretonBack1 joining the @EnvAgency executive directors team. These are crucial roles in challenging times, but lots to look forward to in 2021. https://t.co/f4w8A75Qtg https://t.co/rfNq85eV07

More fantastic work from our #StaffsSUNRISE project! Transforming the Trent into a more diverse and dynamic habitat for wildlife. 
@StaffsUni @EnvAgencyMids @WildTroutTrust @CraigBennett3 https://t.co/dP3LBMY7NU
Sara, from Todmorden, has started a scheme that not only provides Christmas trees for homes but also might help stop flooding in her area 🎄♻️ https://t.co/iCqqpDTZzv

tweets.text: The @EnvAgency now have 22 flood warnings (where flooding is expected) in place across England, the vast majority across the West Country or the West Midlands. River flooding is possible overnight, even after the amber rain warnings expire. https://t.co/b9E1cdPQOs

@Nick_Unsworth @EnfieldCouncil @connectNLWA @NLHPP @Ianbarnes2001 @Nesil_Caliskan @StopTheRebuild @EnfieldDispatch @RosieP4 @JamesAbbott2013 @EnvAgency @pritipatel I fear they'll remain as tightlipped as @EnfieldCouncil. Clearly unmoved by 15 deaths/yr in London due to #incineration from 5 #efw plants. All caused by NO2 & particulates - the same that killed Ella. How much evidence do they need? @StopTheRebuild https://t.co/DjeGBrSpqy

tweets.text:
We prosecute waste criminals AND those who block our efforts to do so.

A builder from Essex was fined for hampering our probe into the illegal dumping of bales of waste in Kent.

Read more: https://t.co/KyeLM9gn9T

File pic: bales of waste left on private land. #Essex #Crime https://t.co/dIN1t43Idm

Second gauging of the day for @EnvAgencySW . River Fowey@ Restormel. Approx 39 cumecs. One of the Crown Jewels of Devon and Cornwall gauges- there is a major abstraction supplying most of Cornwall’s drinking water, plus it lies upstream of Lostwithiel, so is key for #floodwarning https://t.co/fAH8040xcQ

tweets.text:
Very pleased to have welcomed 2 new colleagues to #TeamEA's Executive Leadership Team over the last couple of weeks: Lucy Hunt (COO) and Catherine Wright (Interim Exec Director of FCRM).

Great to see @johncurtinEA in his new role as Exec Director for Local Operations too. https://t.co/bwOScjotLy
First gauging of the day complete . River Lynher at Pillaton for @EnvAgencySW . 29 cumecs, good gauging with the ADCP https://t.co/Gx1VyLAZMH

That the farm advisor working for @HerefordshireWT, in case that's not clear.
If you see this sort of run off, please report it to @EnvAgency https://t.co/hWZDJuQtnC

Caton Road, Lancaster (Phase 3) Flood Risk Management Scheme https://t.co/JgUy0kdOKw Drone shots show the scale of the task and how £3.85 #ERDF has been spent. Great work by all involved @esif1420england @LancasterCC @EnvAgency @TheFloodHub #growthprogramme

tweets.text: @EnvAgencySW @CornwallCouncil Where's west Cornwall gone to?#cornish #Cornwall

Roads, rivers, and ditches all running red today in Herefordshire.
So much soil destined for the Wye or one of its tributaries. 
Our farm advisor is working hard with farmers to reduce compaction & increase SOM. Capturing #carbon, improving aeration & percolation. #winwinwin #NbS https://t.co/LbBIUb8KpJ

Just one eggcup of water can wreck your engine.

#Flooding is likely in south-west England today due to heavy rain. Remember, never drive through flood water and plan your route before you travel.

Check your flood risk: https://t.co/BpUpnj1mdd https://t.co/GS7BokWhbb
